entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Blue River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:22 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Snow beginning before morning. Low minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 7.
